Lines.Speaker: Tavernkeep
Lines.Text: Welcome to the Gull’s Rest. If you’re looking for work, talk to the foreman out by the fish market. If you’re looking for trouble, you found me.

Choices.Text: Any news about the gate closure?
I’ll take a bowl of stew (2g).

Lines.Speaker: Tavernkeep
Lines.Text: Refugees flood in; Dheowryth burns out there. City’s shut ‘til the Council stops panicking. Get a permit or a blessing or a friend with a key.

Lines.Speaker: Tavernkeep
Lines.Text: Hot and thin. But it fills a gap.

Lines.Speaker: Tavernkeep
Lines.Text: Foreman owes the Clerk a favour. Shift a few crates and they’ll stamp you a work permit.

Lines.Speaker: Tavernkeep
Lines.Text: Lightkeeper at the lighthouse writes pilgrim writs. Ring the Old Sea Bell and bring him a lantern or two.

Lines.Speaker: Tavernkeep
Lines.Text: Customs booth near the main gate. Clerk’s a crow but coin is seed. Or find an elf with clout.

Lines.Speaker: Tavernkeep
Lines.Text: Smugglers ply under the pier. Bone token marks you a friend—if you’re willing to owe.

Choices.Text: Where do I get the token?

Lines.Speaker: Tavernkeep
Lines.Text: Try the Imperial Wharf. Silk and amber. They don’t like their cousins, but they hate delays more.

Lines.Speaker: Tavernkeep
Lines.Text: Shanty Alley. Ask for the Broker. Mind you keep your kidneys.
